title: Tour de France Bike Check: Tadej Pogačar Rides a Colnago V4Rs with Lust-Worthy Details
content:
This Colnago V4Rs is a Tour de France bike that obsesses over the details. It's not just an off-the-shelf range-topper for the Tour's yellow jersey.

Read the full article at Tour de France Bike Check: Tadej Pogačar Rides a Colnago V4Rs with Lust-Worthy Details on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
